tutorials.title: How to connect your crypto wallet

faqs.question: How do I register on the platform?
faqs.answer: You can register by providing your email and creating a password. Then follow the verification steps.

faqs.question: Is voting through ChainElect secure?
faqs.answer: Yes! The platform uses blockchain technology, ensuring that votes cannot be manipulated.

faqs.question: How can I verify my vote?
faqs.answer: After voting, you will receive a unique hash that you can use to verify your vote in the system.
